thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: La La Land wins Best Original Score and Best Original Song : Hollywood, News - India Today

title: Oscars 2017: La La Land wins Best Original Score and Best Original Song : Hollywood, News - India Today
text:
Oscars 2017: La La Land wins Best Original Score and Best Original Song La La Land won Best Original Score and Best Original Song at Oscars 2017. IndiaToday.in | Written by Charu Thakur A + A - 
Unlike the Golden Globe Awards, La La Land has not been able to sweep many awards at the 89th Academy Awards but it is slowly getting there with its two back-to-back wins. The film has won Best Original Score and Best Original Song Award at the Oscars 2017. 
Justin Hurtwiz won his two Oscars together for both the categories. 
La La Land's City of Stars has won Best Original Song Oscar. 
Starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, the musical has won the hearts of fans and critics alike. La La Land has won a total of four Oscars till now.
